column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Whenever we miss packing an item for a to-go order
column2: we create an incident report so that we can track our staff members' mistakes. However
column3: we also have firsthand experience wherein UberEats and DoorDash drivers have removed items from orders and even have failed to deliver orders after picking them up from our restaurants. We have no control over these incidents
column4: and despite our efforts to determine cause
column5: we receive the same response from these third-party delivery app companies: Instruct your guest to request a refund.
